Set your reward and get notified when submissions come in. Set your reward and get notified when submissions come in. DAIUSDCSolanaBONKUSDTDAIUSDCSolanaBONKUSDTPolygonBNBEThereumBitcoinDoge CoinPolygonBNBEThereumBitcoinDoge CoinFAQWhat is Lancer?

Lancer is a web extension for outsourcing engineering tasks. Users assign a reward to an issue on GitHub and payout when the pull request solving said issue gets merged.
Does Lancer have access to my code?
No, Lancer only listens to actions on Github and cannot read or store any of your code.
How do I post jobs on Lancer?
You are able to fund an issue through the web extension or post a job on our website.
Do I have to be paid with crypto?
No, you can also have payments sent to your bank account.
Is Lancer another bounty platform?
No. Lancer is a new way to hire contracted developers. Our tool makes free-lancing more transparent, secure and productive.
